plot: Paudge, a cranky Irish pub owner keeps redecorating his bar hoping to attract customers, but no matter how many grand openings he has the locals stay away. Maybe Paudge needs to change more than his bar.
title: Grand Opening
plot_es: Paudge, a cranky Irish pub owner keeps redecorating his bar hoping to attract customers, but no matter how many grand openings he has the locals stay away. Maybe Paudge needs to change more than his bar.
plot_en: Paudge, a cranky Irish pub owner keeps redecorating his bar hoping to attract customers, but no matter how many grand openings he has the locals stay away. Maybe Paudge needs to change more than his bar.
